about_the_game:
We are currently changing the price to be free! Please don't buy it now. However, you can download the full content of a game on Demo which will cost you nothing.
In case you accidentally purchased it, please go through refund process. Thank you for your interest in our game.

Interactive for everyone
Fitforce is an interactive exercise game that can provide you an immersive game experience, using just a smartphone and PC. Just download the Fitforce application on your phone and connect it with Fitforce on your PC, then you are ready to go. Your workout will not be boring ever again with Fitforce!

Gameplay

Fitforce is divided into many minigames that capture your movement to control and play the game. A minigame makes use of a simple exercise to make your character run, jump, or move according to its rule!

The setup for each game is trivial! For some minigames, you just need to hold the phone. Some other minigames may tell you to put it inside your pocket or sit on a chair while doing so.

Key Features

Get healthy with simple exercises - Fitforce lets you workout with real exercises that can burn your fat, strengthen your muscles, or ease your Office Syndrome. Each exercise is well-known and proved to be effective such as high knees, squat, and jumping jack.

Tons of unique playable characters - You can use coins earned from playing Fitforce to get characters ranging from Nick the Fireman to a robot cop SJX112!

Many entertaining minigames
Fitforce comes with three free minigames.
  • Running Warrior
  • Flappy Dive
  • Rocket Squat
You can buy more minigames to play them and unlock more amazing features of Fitforce.

name: Runster Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Using just your smartphone, you can stay inside and keep exercising no matter what happens outside. With entertaining and interactive gameplay, your workouts will not be boring ever again. Become healthy while enjoying it. Become Fitforce.
